favourite.article: Lord grant me today, a new start in this way. A person of life I would be— Just expressing You in all that I do. Oh may this life flow out of me!
Just expressing You in all that I do. Oh may this life flow out of me!
Oh Lord Jesus, grant us grace to grow with Your life and light so we can can be made useful in Your hands.
Lord grant me today, a new start in this way. A person of life I would be— Just expressing You in all that I do. Oh may this life flow out of me!
O Lord Jesus You are our peace, joy and blessing. Without You life have no meaning. I open myself to You, that You may work in me for the church expression as one in the Body of Christ.
Amen we make Christ us our daily life. He is our Person everyday. We should eat and drink Him...Ohh Lord Jesus, Amen.
O Lord Jesus, we love You. Lord grant me today, a new start in this way. Oh, Lord Your life flow out of me! Amen, love You Lord
Oh Lord! The ground in my heart!

Amen! Lord make me a person of life! Soften my heart and remove all the rocks and thorns so that You can spread freely and be rooted deeply!
"Lord grant me today, a new start in this way. A person of life I would be-- Just expressing You in all that I do. Oh may this life flow out of me!"

Hallelujah for Christ is the living Person Himself and that this Christ is now living within us- that is in our Regenerated Spirit. How we need to to touch this living Person in us by exercising our spirit to contact God, receive God and be one with God!!! Amen!!! I really enjoy playing this hymn!!!
Amen. I will impose my life to live with You day by day.
Lord, by Your grace make me a person of life. Make me dependent on You.
Thank You Jesus for Your life in us! Keep flowing Lord...Keep flowing...Amen! Yes Lord! We love You so much!

Amen! What kind of person we are determines what kind of fruits we produce. Oh Lord Jesus grow in us so we may express You, You as life and reality. Thank You that You are the perfect One, You are the righteous One. Hallelujah! Lord Jesus! We just love You.

Amen! Amen! Amen! My dearest Lord grant me today, a new start in this way. A person of *life I would be — Just expressing You in all that I do. Oh may this *life flow out of me! Oh Lord Jesus! Increase Your pure flow of *life. Bless You my Beloved. Praises to You! Hallelujah!
